Post 1.Title: Yale University Summer Internship 2025
Post 1.Content: Exciting opportunity! Apply for the Yale University Summer Internship 2025 in Senator Warnock’s Office. Study in the USA and gain valuable experience. Visit www.scholarshipsads.com for more details!
Post 1.Author: Admin_ScholarshipTeam

Comments.Text: This looks amazing! Does anyone know the eligibility criteria?
I applied last year and it was a life-changing experience! Highly recommend.

Post 2.Title: CSIS Internships 2025 in USA
Post 2.Content: Don’t miss out on the CSIS Internships 2025 in USA! These are paid opportunities open to students from different countries. Deadlines vary, so check out www.opportunitiescircle.com to apply now!
Post 2.Author: Admin_OpportunitiesCircle

Comments.Text: Are these internships remote or in-person?
Thanks for sharing! I’m definitely applying for this.

Post 3.Title: WISE Summer 2025 Internships
Post 3.Content: Attention engineering students! The WISE Summer 2025 Internships application deadline is 1 February 2025. Ranked one of the best in the U.S. by The Princeton Review. Apply at wise-intern.org!
Post 3.Author: Admin_WISETeam

Comments.Text: This is perfect for engineering students! Any tips for the application?
I heard their program is top-notch. Excited to apply!

Post 4.Title: North South University MS in CSE Spring 2025
Post 4.Content: Pursue your Master of Science in Computer Science and Engineering at North South University! Apply for Spring 2025 by 27 November 2024. Admission test on 29 November 2024. Visit www.northsouth.edu for more info!
Post 4.Author: Admin_NSUAdmissions

Comments.Text: What’s the admission test like? Any preparation tips?
I’m so excited for this program! NSU has a great reputation.

Post 5.Title: Hudson County Community College Open House Spring 2025
Post 5.Content: Join Hudson County Community College at their Spring 2025 Open House on 22 March and 26 April! Tour the campus, meet faculty, and explore programs. Register at www.hccc.edu/openhouse!
Post 5.Author: Admin_HCCC

Comments.Text: This is a great opportunity to explore HCCC! Will there be financial aid info?
I attended last year’s open house and loved it. Definitely going again!

Post 6.Title: North South University MPH Spring 2025
Post 6.Content: Advance your career with a Master of Public Health at North South University! Apply for Spring 2025 by 27 November 2024. Admission test on 29 November 2024. Learn more at www.northsouth.edu!
Post 6.Author: Admin_NSUAdmissions

Comments.Text: Does this program offer any scholarships?
I’m interested in the Epidemiology track. Sounds amazing!

Post 7.Title: North South University EMPH Spring 2025
Post 7.Content: Elevate your expertise with the Executive Master of Public Health at North South University! Apply for Spring 2025 by 27 November 2024. Admission test on 29 November 2024. Visit www.northsouth.edu!
Post 7.Author: Admin_NSUAdmissions

Comments.Text: This is perfect for working professionals! What’s the class schedule like?
I’ve heard great things about NSU’s public health programs.

Post 8.Title: UCSI University Trust Scholarship 2025
Post 8.Content: UCSI University Trust Scholarship 2025 offers RM 30 million in funding! Open to undergraduate and postgraduate students. Apply by 15 March 2025 at www.ucsiuniversitytrust.com!
Post 8.Author: Admin_UCSITrust

Comments.Text: RM 30 million is huge! What programs are eligible?
I’m applying for this scholarship. Fingers crossed!

Post 9.Title: The Speakout Media Scholarship to America
Post 9.Content: Fully funded opportunity! The Speakout Media Scholarship to Tulane University in the USA is open. Apply by 5 December 2024. Don’t miss your chance to study in America!
Post 9.Author: Admin_SpeakoutMedia

Comments.Text: A fully funded scholarship to the USA? This is incredible!
What are the requirements for this scholarship?
